languages.text: "Мы тоже решили блюсти осторожность. Слова его звучали красиво, а облик был благороден, но... Ложь всегда и выглядит похожей на правду, верно?"
"We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"
languages.original_text: "Мы тоже решили блюсти осторожность. Слова его звучали красиво, а облик был благороден, но... Ложь всегда и выглядит похожей на правду, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我们也认为应该谨慎行事。他的话就像蜂蜜一样流淌，他听起来似乎是位可敬之人，然而……谎言听起来总是像真理一样，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: “我们也认为应该谨慎行事。他的话就像蜂蜜一样流淌，他听起来似乎是位可敬之人，然而……谎言听起来总是像真理一样，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «También decidimos ser cautos. Sus palabras eran como la miel y parecía honorable... pero las mentiras siempre parecen verdad, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: «También decidimos ser cautos. Sus palabras eran como la miel y parecía honorable... pero las mentiras siempre parecen verdad, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちも用心することにした。彼の言葉は蜜のように流れ、高潔な人物に見えたが…嘘は常に真実のように見えるものだろう？」
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちも用心することにした。彼の言葉は蜜のように流れ、高潔な人物に見えたが…嘘は常に真実のように見えるものだろう？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben auch entschieden, vorsichtig zu sein. Seine Worte flossen wie Honig, und er schien ein ehrenhafter Mann zu sein, doch ... Lügen wirken immer wie die Wahrheit, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben auch entschieden, vorsichtig zu sein. Seine Worte flossen wie Honig, und er schien ein ehrenhafter Mann zu sein, doch ... Lügen wirken immer wie die Wahrheit, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons aussi décidé de nous montrer prudents. Ses paroles coulaient comme du miel, et il semblait tout à fait honorable, mais... Les mensonges ressemblent toujours à des vérités, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons aussi décidé de nous montrer prudents. Ses paroles coulaient comme du miel, et il semblait tout à fait honorable, mais... Les mensonges ressemblent toujours à des vérités, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

languages.text: "Biz de dikkatli olmaya karar verdik. Ağzından bal damlıyor, onurlu bir adama benziyor ama... Yalanla hakikati ayırt etmek kolay değildir, öyle ya?"
languages.original_text: "We also decided to be cautious. His words flowed like honey, and he seemed an honourable man, but... Lies always look like truth, don't they?"

traits.locale_text: "Biz de dikkatli olmaya karar verdik. Ağzından bal damlıyor ve onurlu bir adama benziyor ama... Yalanla hakikati ayırt etmek zordur, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
